r.s: DHTML replacement for the standard JavaScript alert window for client-side validation using the tableless renderer
r.d: This is a DHTML replacement for the standard JavaScript alert window for client-side validation of forms built with HTML_QuickForm when using the HTML_QuickForm_Renderer_Tableless renderer.
r.n: - Adopted the two minor stylesheet changes from tableless renderer (version 0.5.0). The width for the fieldset and the legend tag was changed from "560px" to "100%".
